sentences: Hillary Clinton’s State Department gifted an “unknown number” of children to human traffickers after refusing to run the most basic checks on these so-called “caregivers,” according to a bombshell Senate report released late on Thursday and completely covered up by mainstream media.

sentences: These children were then sexually abused, starved, and forced into child labor, according to the Senate report.

sentences: Disturbingly, the fate of many of these children, mostly migrants, remains unknown.
